title: Explaining maths without Numbers
description: Tim Harford interviews Milo Beckman - a young mathematician, still in his twenties, who has written a book called ‘Math without Numbers’. Milo explains why he wanted to strip out digits to make it easier to describe the beauty of mathematics.
itunes:subtitle: Tim Harford speaks to mathematician Milo Beckman about the beauty of maths.
itunes:summary: Tim Harford interviews Milo Beckman - a young mathematician, still in his twenties, who has written a book called ‘Math without Numbers’. Milo explains why he wanted to strip out digits to make it easier to describe the beauty of mathematics.
itunes:author: BBC Radio 4
